jog_speed.label: Jog Speed
jog_speed.description: Determines how fast the tool moves when it’s not carving.

work_speed.label: Work Speed
work_speed.description: Determines how fast the tool feeds into the material.

plunge_speed.label: Plunge Speed
plunge_speed.description: Determines how fast the tool moves on the material.

step_down.label: Step Down
step_down.description: Enter the depth of each carving step.

density.label: Density
density.description: Set the density of the tool head movements. The highest density is 10 dot/mm. When generating G-code, the density will be re-calculated to ensure the process work normally.
